<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Far Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4873) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 159 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your experience in the field has taught you how to focus your aim at a distance, increasing your accuracy. Double your weapons’ range increments.

<title level="2">Far Shot leads to...</title>
[Legendary Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=4912)
name: Far Shot
